head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths RIGNEY, MSGR. JAMES F.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths RIGNEY, MSGR. JAMES F.

block.p: RIGNEY-Msgr. James F. Former Rector of St. Patrick's Cathedral,N.Y. Died in Florida on August 31, 2000. Interred at Holy Mount Cemetery, Eastchester, N.Y. Survived by a brother Msgr. Philip T. Rigney and a sister Marion Rigney of Singer Island, Florida. A Memorial Mass will be celebrated at St. Patrick's Cathedral on Wednesday, Sept 27th at 12 noon.

RIGNEY-Msgr. James F. Former Rector of St. Patrick's Cathedral,N.Y. Died in Florida on August 31, 2000. Interred at Holy Mount Cemetery, Eastchester, N.Y. Survived by a brother Msgr. Philip T. Rigney and a sister Marion Rigney of Singer Island, Florida. A Memorial Mass will be celebrated at St. Patrick's Cathedral on Wednesday, Sept 27th at 12 noon.
